title: Korea Biomedical Review
text:
Korea Biomedical Review (), abbreviated as KBR, is a <a href="South%20Korea">South Korea</a>-based <a href="online">online</a> <a href="English-language">English-language</a> <a href="newspaper">newspaper</a> that mainly delivers <a href="news">news</a> related to the field of <a href="healthcare">healthcare</a> in the <a href="Republic%20of%20Korea">Republic of Korea</a>. 
"Korea Biomedical Review" is the first English newspaper in South Korea focusing on the healthcare field, and its <a href="ISO%204">ISO 4</a> abbreviation is "Korea Biomed. Rev.".
The newspaper's official website <a href="domain%20name">domain name</a>, <a href="https%3A//www.koreabiomed.com/">koreabiomed.com</a>, was registered on October 7, 2016. The first issue of "Korea Biomedical Review" was released on 22 February 2017 as a <a href="sister%20paper">sister paper</a> to its Korean version, the "<a href="Korean%20Doctors%27%20Weekly">Korean Doctors' Weekly</a>".
